testCase.name: AboutPage renders without crashing
AboutPage sets the document title to "About | Marvel App"
CharacterDetail renders without crashing
CharacterDetail displays the character image with correct src and alt attributes
CharacterDetail displays the character description
CharacterDetail displays "No description available." when description is not provided
CharacterDetail displays the character modification date
CharacterDetail displays "No modification date available." when modification date is not provided
ContactPage renders without crashing
ContactPage sets the document title to "Contact | Marvel App"
ContactPage renders the heading "Contact Us"
ContactPage renders the paragraph with correct text
ContactPage renders the email link with correct href
ContactPage renders the email link with correct text
CharacterDetailPage renders without crashing
CharacterDetailPage displays the character name in the heading
CharacterDetailPage renders the CharacterDetail component with the correct character prop
CharactersList renders an empty list when no characters are provided
CharactersList renders a list of characters
CharactersList renders character names correctly
CharactersList applies correct styles to links
